Privacy Policy

Effective Date: 8/10/2024

1. Introduction

This Privacy Policy ("Policy") outlines the types of information collected by OnlyPosts ("we," "us," or "our") through our application ("Service") and how we use, disclose, and protect that information. By using our Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Policy.

2. Information We Collect

- Personal Information: We collect certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to your email address and login credentials for third-party social media platforms (Twitter, Reddit, TikTok, YouTube), when you register or log in to the Service.

- User-Generated Content: Users may upload photographs, videos, and other content ("User Content"), which are stored on our secure servers.

3. Data Retention and Deletion

- Retention: We retain your Personal Information and User Content for as long as your account remains active.

- Deletion: Upon account deletion, all associated Personal Information and User Content will be irretrievably deleted from our servers. We do not retain any copies of your data once your account is deleted.

4. Data Security

- Encryption: Usernames and passwords are stored in an encrypted format within our database.

- Server Security: Our servers are secured with industry-standard encryption and access control mechanisms to prevent unauthorized access.

- Breach Notification: In the event of a data breach or unauthorized access to your data, we will promptly notify you via email and may notify relevant authorities to pursue legal action against the perpetrators.

5. User Rights and Data Requests

- Access Requests: Users have the right to request access to their Personal Information stored by us. All such requests must be submitted via our support page.

- Privacy Inquiries: Users may submit inquiries regarding their privacy rights or our data practices through our support page.

6. Cookies and Authentication

- Cookies: We do not use cookies or similar tracking technologies within our Service.

- JWT Tokens: We utilize JSON Web Tokens (JWT) for user authentication and session management.

7. AI Interaction and Data Usage

- AI Training: By using the Service, you acknowledge and agree that your interactions with our AI tools may be utilized by OpenAI for the purpose of training and improving future AI models. Opting out of this data usage is not permitted, as it is a requirement of the OpenAI API, which we utilize.

8. Disclosure of Information

- Third-Party Disclosure: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your Personal Information or User Content to outside parties. We do not share your information with third parties unless required by law.

9. Compliance with Legal Obligations

- Legal Requirements: We comply with all applicable data protection and privacy laws and regulations. We may disclose your Personal Information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities (e.g., a court or a government agency).

10. Changes to This Policy

- Policy Updates: We reserve the right to update or modify this Policy at any time. We will notify users of any significant changes via email or through the Service. Your continued use of the Service following any changes to this Policy constitutes your acceptance of the revised Policy.

11. Contact Information

If you have any questions, concerns, or requests related to this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact us via the support page on our website.
